Content
Based on the Sham Shui Po district, an attempt was made to analysis the problem in terms of family-related issues:
a)	Single-parent families
b)	New arrivals families
c)	Three-generation families
d)	No kid families 
e)	Single-child families

Direct interviews are conducted with one of the above families. 
-	Describe what this family background and issue are?
-	What kind of situation and needs they are facing with evidence-based? (suggested: Using data, research, literature to support your arguments)
-	Use “Structural Family Therapy” OR “Bowen Family Systems Therapy” to analyses this family (Assessment)
-	Can the existing family services in Hong Kong help them? What are the strengths and limitations?
